StationEntranceVisuals.weOptions[LineDis: Custom (From the name given to the line)
StationEntranceVisuals.weOptions[SubwayL: Choose which shape you want your subway lines to be displayed as.
StationEntranceVisuals.weOptions[TrainLi: Choose which shape you want your train lines to be displayed as.
StationEntranceVisuals.weOptions[TramLin: Choose which shape you want your tram lines to be displayed as.
StationEntranceVisuals.weOptions[BusLine: Choose which shape you want your bus lines to be displayed as.
StationEntranceVisuals.weOptions[LineOpe: Choose which should be the line operators. If you choose generic, you can replace the operator with a custom atlas in the Atlas tab. If you choose a specific city, it will always have the same atlas and logic for that city.
StationEntranceVisuals.weOptions[LineDis: Allows you to change what should be displayed as the line name.
